kizuna_dragon_b_02: I try to visit the schoolyard from time to time.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_b_03:
It’s good to see young ones with so much energy
and vigor...[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_b_04a:
Oh, yes indeed. Just watching is enough to make
even an old man like me feel more alive.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_b_04b:
Do you? That’s a bit of a surprise to hear you say.
You’re one of the young ones too, you know.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_b_tamer_01: Master Hassel. Might I have a word?
kizuna_dragon_b_05: You... What are you doing here?[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_b_06:
I have told you many times not to bother me
here at the academy.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_b_tamer_02:
Yet, I am bound to come. Our family’s future is of
paramount importance.
kizuna_dragon_b_09:
Something important has come up, so I must
excuse myself now.[npcn:12]
kizuna_dragon_b_system_01: You became even closer with Mr. Hassel!
kizuna_dragon_b_10: Let us discuss this matter elsewhere. Come...[npcn:12]
